verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* that \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto the \w residue|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* which were carried away \w captives|strong="H1473"\w*, and to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and to the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* whom \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* had carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

(\w After|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and the \w queen|strong="H1377"\w*, and the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and the \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, and the \w smiths|strong="H4525"\w*, were \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;)\f + \fr 29.2 \ft eunuchs: or, chamberlains\f*

By the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Elasah|strong="H0501"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Gemariah|strong="H1587"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, (whom \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* to \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*) \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto all that are carried away \w captives|strong="H1473"\w*, whom I have caused to be carried \w away|strong="H1540"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

\w Build|strong="H1129"\w* ye \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \add in them;\add* and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of them;

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* ye \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* for your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to \w husbands|strong="H0582"\w*, that they may \w bear|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1121"\w*; that ye may be \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* there, and not \w diminished|strong="H4591"\w*.

And \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* whither I have caused you to be carried away \w captives|strong="H1540"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for it: for in the \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* thereof shall ye have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Let not your \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* and your \w diviners|strong="H7080"\w*, that \add be\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of you, \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* you, neither \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to your \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* which ye cause to be \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w*.

For they \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* unto you in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: I have not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 29.9 \ft falsely: Heb. in a lie\f*

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, That \w after|strong="H6310"\w* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* be \w accomplished|strong="H4390"\w* at \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* I will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* you, and \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* my \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* toward you, in causing you to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

For I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* that I \w think|strong="H2803"\w* toward you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and not of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you an \w expected|strong="H8615"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.\f + \fr 29.11 \ft expected…: Heb. end and expectation\f*
Then shall ye \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon me, and ye shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto me, and I will \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you.
And ye shall \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* me, and \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add me\add*, when ye shall \w search|strong="H1875"\w* for me with all your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

And I will be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and I will turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* your \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*, and I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you from all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and from all the \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and I will bring you \w again|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whence I caused you to be carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*.
¶ Because ye have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath raised us \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* in \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

\add Know\add* that thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add and\add* of your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* that are not gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* with you into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*;

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* upon them the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* them like \w vile|strong="H8182"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, that cannot be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, they are so \w evil|strong="H7455"\w*.

And I will \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H0310"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, with the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and with the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them to be \w removed|strong="H2189"\w* to all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, to be a \w curse|strong="H0423"\w*, and an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, and an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*, and a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, among all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them:\f + \fr 29.18 \ft to be a curse: Heb. for a curse\f*

Because they have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto them by my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them;\add* but ye would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye therefore the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all ye of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, whom I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kolaiah|strong="H6964"\w*, and of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, which \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w* unto you in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*; Behold, I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; and he shall \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* them before your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*;

And of them shall be taken \w up|strong="H3947"\w* a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* by all the \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* which \add are\add* in \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* thee like \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* and like \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w roasted|strong="H7033"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*;

Because they have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w villany|strong="H5039"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* with their \w neighbours’|strong="H7453"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, which I have not \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them; even I \w know|strong="H3045"\w*, and \add am\add* a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ \add Thus\add* shalt thou also \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w Nehelamite|strong="H5161"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 29.24 \ft Nehelamite: or, dreamer\f*

Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Because thou hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* in thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and to \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and to all the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* in the stead of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that ye should be \w officers|strong="H6496"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, for every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that is\add* \w mad|strong="H7696"\w*, and maketh himself a \w prophet|strong="H5012"\w*, that thou shouldest \w put|strong="H5414"\w* him in \w prison|strong="H4115"\w*, and in the \w stocks|strong="H6729"\w*.
Now therefore why hast thou not \w reproved|strong="H1605"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* of \w Anathoth|strong="H6069"\w*, which maketh himself a \w prophet|strong="H5012"\w* to you?

For therefore he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto us \add in\add* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w This|strong="H1931"\w* \add captivity is\add* \w long|strong="H0752"\w*: \w build|strong="H1129"\w* ye \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \add in them;\add* and \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of them.

And \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* this \w letter|strong="H5612"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* to all them of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w Nehelamite|strong="H5161"\w*; Because that \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* hath \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* unto you, and I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* him not, and he caused you to \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in a \w lie|strong="H8267"\w*:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w Nehelamite|strong="H5161"\w*, and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*: he shall not have a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; neither shall he \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; because he hath \w taught|strong="H1696"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H5627"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 29.32  t rebellion: Heb. revolt *
